mapper.select: SELECT r.role FROM user_info u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.uid = ur.uid LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE u.username=#{value}

SELECT DISTINCT(p.permission) FROM user_info u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.uid = ur.uid LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON rp.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id WHERE u.username=#{value}
